meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Richard Fond Kristie Ackerman Michael Rankins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #884.

td.p: Richard Fond, an attorney from Los Angeles, California
Kristie Ackerman, a copy editor originally from Tokyo, Japan
Michael Rankins, a customer service represenative from Rohnert Park, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $44,999)

tr.td: FLORIDA
PRESIDENTIAL NICKNAMES
COWBOY TALK
MUSICAL RELATIVES
KIDDY LIT CREATURES
THE CAMERA

Michael
